Class JcrQuerySampler

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<Map<String,String>>, CanCache, Sampler<Map<String,String>>, TransformingSampler<Sampler<String>,String,Map<String,String>>

    public class JcrQuerySampler
extends JsonSampler<Sampler<String>>
    Samples paths from JCQ query against AEM author.
    Since:
    3.0.0
